long_description: Riding the line between neutral and support, the men's Brooks Ravenna 5 Road-Running Shoes give you that just-right blend of cushion and stability for your long training runs. Synthetic mesh uppers enhance breathability and quick-drying performance; synthetic overlays offer support and a good fit without adding cumbersome weight. Midsoles feature BioMoGo polymer alloy foam, which provides cushioning, energy return and reduced foot fatigue; nontoxic additive helps midsoles break down in landfills. Nylon and spandex linings absorb and disperse moisture for enhanced comfort. Progressive Diagonal Roll Bar triple-density medial posts work to control excessive pronation and balance transitions from midfoot to toe-off. Thermoplastic urethane arch shanks control torsional flex at midfoot for control and support. Forefoot Stable-Pod configuration balances midsole and outsole components to set feet in an efficient, balanced position to maximize stability and responsiveness. Outsoles on the Brooks Ravenna 5 Road-Running Shoes are constructed of a mix of rubber compounds to maximize longevity and grip. Outsoles also feature a special crash pad design that smooths out the landing zone to deliver full ground contact while you run.
short_description: Riding the line between neutral and support, the men's Brooks Ravenna 5 Road-Running Shoes give you that just-right blend of cushion and stability for your long training runs.
